snippet.title: Steal It Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Steal It is an online multiplayer game where it depends on who has the most coins 🪙 at the end of a round. Coins can either be obtained as rewards by completing tasks ✅ or by stealing them from other players. The game has two game modes: a team mode 🤝 and a free-for-all mode. In team mode, there are two teams. One team tries to get coins by completing tasks 🧩 while the other tries to steal them undetected. The players have the opportunity to track down thieves and lock them up in prison 🚔. In the free-for-all mode, everyone is on their own. At certain time intervals ⏳, the abilities you can use will change. You can either steal or perform tasks.

Steal It is available on Steam and Epic Games Store

Website: https://indiepulse.de/steal-it/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2329790/Steal_It/
